name: RO2CH (DEAD)
description: (I quit going on Roblox a while ago and I really don't have the time to update this anymore. Sorry about that!) A Roblox skin based off of the look of the Japanese BBS 2channel. Meant for use on Roblox Forums; I'll try to tweak it for the rest of the main site but that part is no where near being complete.
additional_info: Thanks to 2ch for letting me use their background image without permission!
